duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop high-level design for business requirements and come up with prototypes and demonstrate solution design.
Configure nCino UI Group ,Routes, Screens, product catalog, product package, entities involvement, exposure, collateral management, covenants etc.
Implement solutions using configurations such as Flows, process builders, workflow Rules.
Write Apex programming, Visual force pages, Apex triggers, lightening web components.
Knowledge in nCino Loan Origination process, Core Banking Service – Deposits, Lending and Digital Banking platforms.
Organize time management, and written and verbal communication skills.
Run business architecture design sessions as needed.
Implement nCino features such as nCino Spreading, Auto Spreading, Smart Checklist, DocMan and Flows.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
